elements.2211.03049_5dc18f3e7d43eeecc4ba1840189b6: Whole-body awareness for safe and natural interaction: from brains to collaborative robots
elements.2211.03049_f930d780f240dddd9a2c3c2c9fa18: Robot self-calibration and safe physical human-robot interaction inspired by body representations in primate brains

elements.2211.03049_94c7d37cb6753a1e3c91fb7767d01: Humans and animals excel in combining information from multiple sensory modalities, controlling their complex bodies, adapting to growth, failures, or using tools
elements.2211.03049_77dfa0943192a6e17e09929fe7f86: These capabilities are also highly desirable in robots
elements.2211.03049_0fc837e5ff3ed1fc7ba3f48a6cedc: They are displayed by machines to some extent
elements.2211.03049_3d42de4a00e5f2790a587c3a6f14b: Yet, the artificial creatures are lagging behind
elements.2211.03049_c6737412cd6657fc1e5f0e380b3be: The key foundation is an internal representation of the body that the agent
elements.2211.03049_9c5df230bdbf3b2a9865a5cb87216: The mechanisms of operation of body models in the brain are largely unknown and even less is known about how they are constructed from experience after birth
elements.2211.03049_f92f07a05677d593026706287c4c9: In collaboration with developmental psychologists, we conducted targeted experiments to understand how infants acquire first
elements.2211.03049_6b5c8cd131bcd0ddd17252863bda1: These experiments inform our work in which we construct embodied computational models on humanoid robots that address the mechanisms behind learning, adaptation, and operation of multimodal body representations
elements.2211.03049_10889561674566ffa9b28d305ba93: At the same time, we assess which of the features of the
elements.2211.03049_36edc3771e6b929f07d960d37d49d: should be transferred to robots to give rise to more adaptive and resilient, self-calibrating machines
elements.2211.03049_aa6fcc1bb8a50494e023d589a4ce3: We extend traditional robot kinematic calibration focusing on self-contained approaches where no external metrology is needed: self-contact and self-observation
elements.2211.03049_4ac88e1b23fdc1d09ead69b6a46ba: Problem formulation allowing to combine several ways of closing the kinematic chain simultaneously is presented, along with a calibration toolbox and experimental validation on several robot platforms
elements.2211.03049_1d68afcbc1033e7b082a9fedc37d4: Finally, next to models of the body itself, we study peripersonal space
elements.2211.03049_fd5852bb5398956cdfa9f9f047539: the space immediately surrounding the body
elements.2211.03049_d1bc0920a2232db737bade6c3a2e0: Again, embodied computational models are developed and subsequently, the possibility of turning these biologically inspired representations into safe human-robot collaboration is studied.
elements.2211.03049_ff27fa4426d12b6730d076bc06d08: The main theme in my research has been embodied cognition and its development, how it can be studied using robots, and how inspiration from biology can drive progress in robotic technology
elements.2211.03049_1ad033b8831477bbcd03061b66aba: The specific focus is on representations of the body and the space around it
elements.2211.03049_150089b289e00291b78b5ab2787af: This habilitation thesis is constituted by a collection of thirteen articles (published or accepted for publication), preceded by a common introductory part that links these works into a coherent whole.
elements.2211.03049_fb4ba6abe3baf250cc5cb6900a81a: The methodology employed in my work is the so-called
elements.2211.03049_3f0dbad211747bb1f958ac17f0b6b: This approach can be applied to study phenomena from many disciplines like biology, psychology, or physics
elements.2211.03049_fca5d0976e8fe67a3d4db60010592: As a matter of fact, many sciences that were traditionally mostly analytical are becoming more synthetic, employing computer simulations, for example
elements.2211.03049_f4d4ec1d6a2af3f09e78ff07fb09b: Here we focus on the understanding of intelligence or cognition in particular
elements.2211.03049_690bfb2f641ce6206252d50d84cd6: The synthetic methodology, schematically illustrated in Fig.
elements.2211.03049_4279077f61ed7696ce23a71166d28: abstracting general principles of intelligent behavior
elements.2211.03049_b4537f0e9438bb43ece2d91930090: A very influential paradigm in the study of cognition and intelligence was cognitivism (e.g.,
elements.2211.03049_945f4e9a8f195e5835b98da0d2e6a: ), whereby thinking was understood as a result of computation over symbols that represent the world
elements.2211.03049_5893f8a6725bad8662eb65dc6365a: Such computation in the form of automatic manipulation of abstract symbols was at the heart of the so-called
elements.2211.03049_6f4eecbdbade6f70470a81ade77c5: In fact, the computer was not only a tool for modeling but became a metaphor for the mind
elements.2211.03049_26920ad374319a8e6524978649a40: Cognitivism and GOFAI were thus employing the full synthetic methodology in (1) applying the computer metaphor to model the mind; (2) abstracting general principles and developing algorithms for planning, reasoning, etc.; (3) developing applications like chess-playing programs, expert systems etc.
elements.2211.03049_4e0f32f12dfbfaecb944cc712dce6: While sucessful in the abstract domains, GOFAI faced severe difficulties when controlling robots that had to interact with the physical world in real time
elements.2211.03049_b401a4e3a610f8a6e258343697355: Rodney Brooks has openly attacked the GOFAI position in the seminal articles
elements.2211.03049_1c2739859114bf9ef5e2f252bd54f: Through building robots that interact with the real world, such as insect robots
elements.2211.03049_1410da2405fe72802f77b3e3581af: when we examine very simple level intelligence we find that explicit representations and models of the world simply get in the way
elements.2211.03049_4e56e6c0431a092c4e26418fd6812: It turns out to be better to use the world as its own model.
elements.2211.03049_057950019edacbbe1e4f447310d75: The thesis that intelligent behavior emerges from the dynamic interplay of brain, body and environment has also been articulated by the notion of
elements.2211.03049_22313343cb07b3dfe2625ef845ab7: ) that also started to challenge cognitivism as the dominant paradigm in cognitive science
elements.2211.03049_8fefcf1ab568cdb3d3eff6816d3c2: Different variants of embodied cognition theories have been articulated like the dynamic systems approach to the development of cognition and action
elements.2211.03049_6cdea0bd76306857134594d069e50: Embodied cognition theories stressed the constitutive role of the body and action for even high-level abstract thinking
elements.2211.03049_ad23872b0094bc3369241d91c3d29: Given the importance of the body and closed sensorimotor loops, the analytical and divide-and-conquer approach of empirical sciences studying specific phemonena in isolation is more difficult to apply
elements.2211.03049_7a26b97c786c5de92ece307fe82fd: Instead, a more holistic approach should be adopted
elements.2211.03049_1ce2e811c054d59c434214ff75412: Applying the synthetic methodology to embodied cognition means not only modeling cognitive processes but requires building complete artifacts interacting with the environment
elements.2211.03049_068eac50c1c85e08f9f08cb1a6db4: was the pioneer of this approach already before the era of computers and cognitivism building electronic machines with a minimal

elements.2211.03049_247fd1b65661676312f5c13d812ce: This approach is also articulated by Caligiore et al.
elements.2211.03049_31f5baaee57efd5a309061094fa16: , with the following goals or constraints for the model:
elements.2211.03049_54b29bca05ea1174a812f4553be54: accurately reproduce the behaviors observed in specific psychological experiments
elements.2211.03049_92b3ae77d32e37af737b74e8edf8a: reproduce the learning processes alongside the final behavior
elements.2211.03049_56b76b6abf173a6074a74e4e89870: use architectures and algorithms constrained by neuroscientific evidence
elements.2211.03049_0b1eeef8150b8abe4fbcddf8ed306: the model should control an embodied agent
elements.2211.03049_e08d4097b9f7779533cb13aac8442: Certain aspects of a natural system are studied, abstracted, and finally reproduced in an artificial system, which is then subject to investigations
elements.2211.03049_de2b4627da29122e93267fd1ce9bc: The behavior as well as developmental and learning processes leading to the final behavior of the artificial system are compared with the original natural system, serving as a model of the phenomenon
elements.2211.03049_ea63b72a76fb24d4df50b1c4e8bc3: Not only the overt behavior but also the inner workings responsible for it are compared
elements.2211.03049_952de7d424341a1908343a54cfe6b: The key question is what can embodied cognition learn from synthetic modeling
elements.2211.03049_b0b0c01e5faee8d4c47eedc69c86a: The key benefits, inspired by Cangelosi and Parisi
elements.2211.03049_c19b915f9cdc24eedcab035b387c9: Explicit and detailed expression of theory
elements.2211.03049_fa5bda59607dd68bb8b679781c80a: in a robot, it has to be explicit, detailed, and complete because otherwise it could not be tested in the robot.
elements.2211.03049_8c0fd5ca60623ced9a94a55c42c72: Any theory should ultimately be validated by comparing it to the biological or psychological phenomenon of interest
elements.2211.03049_3ac32ee80b9e1624bff1fc1099987: However, after implementing it in a robot, one can verify if it generates the expected behavior
elements.2211.03049_d85fb9c546bbd7741c9b89a72faeb: for example, whether a machine built according to a model of walking actually walks
elements.2211.03049_b931d6b2028ff784c4e730b7d8336: Often, this will not be the case and several iterations improving the theory will follow.
elements.2211.03049_abdf78a1edab7c8da0dfe85b0b901: The behavior of the robot may not match with the original expectations or may display new unexpected characteristics that can be compared with existing empirical data or lead to the design of new experiments.
elements.2211.03049_d83340bed9bfcac9679f76719a661: With embodied computational models, one typically has access to all variables, including internal variables (raw and preprocessed sensory values, internal states, motor commands, etc.)
elements.2211.03049_36f65c2c3b079e4b193a58e53c642: In addition, it is often relatively easy to manipulate these variables and thus simulate experiments that would otherwise be impossible or ethically unacceptable to perform (e.g., simulating sensory or motor impairments).
elements.2211.03049_60fbed56fac38fd8bad62f9b9d14d: Robots as powerful allies for the study of embodied cognition from the bottom up

elements.2211.03049_acaf8cde96b393f253aaceecc4237: that are in some respects akin to human bodies and can thus be used to expand the domain of computational modeling by anchoring it to the physical environment and a physical body and allowing for instantiation of complete sensorimotor loops

elements.2211.03049_3fdf119927460b8cd66a1443e53b1: This thesis is a collection of published works, complemented by relatively brief texts that explain the relationships between the individual articles
elements.2211.03049_36214cc4dc02e68f5c09e61c824be: The story of the thesis is largely told in three book chapters and the reader is advised to consult them
elements.2211.03049_eb0dcbc553eb99f0b1ddde56a5122: , the methodology of using humanoid robots to study embodied cognition is explained and illustrated on examples
elements.2211.03049_a6ddad11c95d60c3ef68252e3f5ec: , body models in humans, animals, and robots are contrasted
elements.2211.03049_65feed5f639abfd3a8ad667f73a22: , an overview of biologically inspired robot body models and self-calibration is provided for a robotics encyclopedia
elements.2211.03049_b8256079091eeb3bb81f51c70152a: All three articles were prepared for a wider, often interdisciplinary, audience, and they are thus accessible even for non-experts in a specific field.
elements.2211.03049_87ed8a2252d9a32df0747b967568c: The rest of the thesis brings together articles with a more technical content and groups them as follows

elements.2211.03049_c1ef4320290148a7a017ede3e3890: brings together works on safety of physical human-robot interaction

elements.2211.03049_936424910f30bb37e6dcb182b786b: A wealth of observations has been accumulated about development of the foetus and the infant in the months before and after birth
elements.2211.03049_31047898e760855b5ecfc62baddfa: There is certainly a great deal to learn for the infant in this period, but the assumption in my work is that the, possibly primary, target of what the infant is learning about in this period is its own body
elements.2211.03049_31fa9d9aba4cd820722bd2893fb93: Understanding what its body parts are, what it can do with them, and what the consequences would be, are essential prerequisites for almost everything that follows
elements.2211.03049_2917cac47cf986d5e70bec89d4096: This is the sensorimotor or ecological self
elements.2211.03049_8c747542562f03d7dd24add50c004: The second assumption relates to the way in which the infant learns
elements.2211.03049_7e561c248a8f0cc18ef1d30da2c5c: In my work, self-touch or haptic exploration of one's own body is considered a key activity that may bootstrap learning about the body as an object in space
elements.2211.03049_1881c3da8ef7679e689e22023c916: We assume that motor-proprioceptive-tactile contingencies provide sufficient material for the infant to construct
elements.2211.03049_1582bc04583a7428e6de89b36a265: , or body know-how, allowing her for example to reach for specific body parts when presented with a tactile stimulus
elements.2211.03049_0042a8b2ab6e13df1cf5a7a619091: This sensorimotor account is presented in
elements.2211.03049_7f0475f0b33d9eed5cdcdddd2d622: The role of vision is increasingly important during postnatal development as the acuity and gaze control improves
elements.2211.03049_39d9ffcbcc8047547bb4f9b8e6c94: Eventually, it is likely that the representations of the body and peripersonal space become predominantly vision-based
elements.2211.03049_cee799f49a8943d5240775bfed7eb: However, to what extent, when, and how this occurs still needs to be established.
elements.2211.03049_101f20aa123792969e76f72925376: Fetuses initially perform local movements directed to areas of the body most sensitive to touch: the face, but also soles of feet
elements.2211.03049_1dc1d92ffb89941f12245567c2b02: Later, from 26 to 28 weeks of gestational age, they also use the back of the hands and touch other body areas like thighs, legs, and knees
elements.2211.03049_7e9c2467c7a4a9fc934bd94ebf19d: In addition, from 19 weeks, fetuses anticipate hand-to-mouth movements
elements.2211.03049_cf42a19043bb4a32df6945b12f3c3: (the mouth opens prior to contact) and from 22 weeks, the movements seem to show the recognizable form of intentional actions, with kinematic patterns that depend on the goal of the action (toward the mouth vs. toward the eyes)
elements.2211.03049_417769801ba30f89ce9042988a8d5: Hand-mouth coordination continues to develop after birth
elements.2211.03049_d3325686d02eff384cb6b6b93ba1a: By 2-3 months, infants engage in exploration of their own body as it moves and acts in the environment
elements.2211.03049_94b84b34d832a187bb13c8e395c3e: They babble and touch their own body, attracted and actively involved in investigating the rich intermodal redundancies, temporal contingencies, and spatial congruence of self-perception.
elements.2211.03049_b689c2bcf716ed7390b64e5af8e88: followed spontaneous behavior of infants from 3 to 9 weeks;
elements.2211.03049_a776497e8ea62b7256cea8223fbd9: from birth to 6 months of age
elements.2211.03049_2ac040de70e820fbcfa922fb1230f: Their main findings regarding self-touch were:
elements.2211.03049_ad30008828c7877702b69eddf0e70: rostro-caudal progression: head and trunk contacts are more frequent in the beginning, followed by more caudal body locations including hips, then legs, and eventually the feet
elements.2211.03049_d1ff205dc8c10dd07601eb731e4f0: contacts are typically made with the ipsilateral hand
elements.2211.03049_01bfa5de74d46804bbda6b5c2fb8a: , as infants moved their hand while remaining in contact with their body, were frequently observed by
elements.2211.03049_61d5e6582c6778d9d4c645d130812: In summary, infants acquire ample experience of touching their body, which allows for the learning of the first tactile-proprioceptive-motor models of the body
elements.2211.03049_f2d15f45696e9a034fa30be371f28: The ability to learn from this experience goes hand in hand with dynamic neural development in this period
elements.2211.03049_8aa0fd8d68c6abe9c08c46c206ff9: for a review focusing specifically on self-touch
elements.2211.03049_177e5667055cd532c51e197b0321b: Yet, the behavioral organization of such early tactile exploration is not understood
elements.2211.03049_d49c0dc9aeac8d336aa66d887745d: Are the touches on the body spontaneous or systematic? If there is a particular structure
elements.2211.03049_35c41683cb6c0567dc0f0d72ea0df: which seems to be the case
elements.2211.03049_0293c6edaca71bcb10d332e84f598: theorized that in newborns, action and perception as well as the
elements.2211.03049_674b37afbccaeb2abe9b5b9253380: of individual sensory modalities are separated (cf.
elements.2211.03049_020e24546d41252e7fe4979dc735d: for evidence that visual and motor modalities are connected early after birth)

elements.2211.03049_b71a8a6037b92f2b39887d665d754: Another window into the development of tactile localization is provided by experiments that exploit crossed hands or crossed feet postures, often employed to study conflicts between encoding touch in an anatomical versus external frame of reference

elements.2211.03049_00c1b73400ed03d4189c1d4fbafe1: These articles are not included in this habilitation which is submitted for the Technical Cybernetics program
elements.2211.03049_248f9c43b95ad34847e30c3739980: contain also sections reporting results of experiments with infants specifically targeting the needs of the modeling endeavour.
elements.2211.03049_6053f4abd57cf7ffb319c2c815cbd: The observations from the studies on babies provide inputs and constraints for the embodied computational modeling
elements.2211.03049_2098a68dea560c375bc45227936d8: In line with the synthetic methodology (Section
elements.2211.03049_89dcc639d7d3ad7ada0758a6b6cb1: ), inspiration from biology may contribute to the discovery of general principles that may eventually give rise to useful technology like self-calibrating robots
elements.2211.03049_e8e457bebea1aa50afd96651c4480: However, the primary goal is to help uncover the mechanims of the development of body know-how in infants
elements.2211.03049_2d3a59a44ef51ac18222493fdb16f: Collecting unambiguous empirical evidence is complicated by the age of the subjects
elements.2211.03049_ca6fbd48e33f25eae4b6441f21b07: infants in the first year are preverbal and one thus cannot easily instruct them and their cooperation during experiments is limited
elements.2211.03049_27894b0d7775cb1e8a73d80105f00: Similarly, manipulations (e.g., reaching for a tactile stimulus only with a certain limb) are hard to orchestrate and additional setups like motion capture or brain imaging are also almost impossible to arrange
elements.2211.03049_81dd11cd9460d31baf8a0c17f65af: Therefore, robot models that allow arbitrary manipulations and where all internal variables can be accessed provide an indispensable tool.
elements.2211.03049_8af59c489555c35e54df3a1cc5eee: The results of empirical studies from Chapter
elements.2211.03049_e6220928075e0767916aed3e75a54: flow into embodied computational models on humanoid robots that address the mechanisms of development of reaching and somatosensory perception in early infancy
elements.2211.03049_8989a68553eaaf3ff61e9f80cfa9c: Humanoid robots with pressure-sensitive electronic skins covering large areas of their bodies provide the right platform for this type of work
elements.2211.03049_16f49efb256cb48611b49df2dbc56: There are four articles in this research strand
elements.2211.03049_4d3d50030b24caff9a3606d15ec24: , three of which are included in the thesis
elements.2211.03049_d00a7b49f758e6f38dd58e7a9c831: , is a conceptual one, in collaboration with developmental and cognitive psychologists and provides a natural transition from the empirical studies to embodied computational modeling of the development of reaching to the body
elements.2211.03049_033968f77ecbbbd9da4f8baef4789: , focuses on active body exploration and compares different algorithms from the family of intrinsically motivated learning (or artificial curiosity)
elements.2211.03049_7a4ce7a826c40472f4bdb36a13007: This work demonstrates that efficient exploration of the skin space and learning of inverse models is possible
elements.2211.03049_24a82fd227029ee4c95cb436991a8: First grounding of the modeling work in experimental data is attempted (study of motor redundancy in infant reaching and link to
elements.2211.03049_6642b57b6f2717a173afa3759eab9: , studies the development of a biologically motivated representation of the robot skin surface: the robot
elements.2211.03049_bade443dc97a14617a4f5c455f713: The robot is exposed to tactile stimulations on its whole body and the corresponding tactile activations are recorded
elements.2211.03049_27dd901cfaafb14779caea83ec5a3: These are then fed into a self-organizing (or Kohonen) map algorithm and the representations that emerge are studied
elements.2211.03049_29f6badc135be7a4b77fca747a492: Modifications of the standard algorithm that provide the right constraints to channel learning toward the layout of the neural map observed in primate brains are developed
elements.2211.03049_2a84ff043450fb9f6eeebf4f20a08: studies the development of reaching to objects external to the body
elements.2211.03049_503a3569329da6c520042e6479758: These are perceived visually, but we concentrate on the role of haptic feedback in learning the behavior on the robot
elements.2211.03049_862cfc04206703617f334e2a38792: If the object is at first randomly contacted, proprioception provides an alternative to vision to guide subsequent reaching movements
elements.2211.03049_032921d8f2698382554976c375bd3: connects reaching to the body with reaching to external objects.
elements.2211.03049_d7a878b54296a2f044edb71c5add6: , the space immediately surrounding the body is called peripersonal space
elements.2211.03049_7a16ac1b18413f9a09a53e5d900e8: There are two related but different meanings associated with peripersonal space (PPS): (i) space immediately surrounding the body and (ii) space that we can act upon / within our reach
elements.2211.03049_45d17a5a13aeef9a00f1b9a59835d: Their representations in the brain are realized by fronto-parietal networks, with an important role attributed to bimodal neurons with visuo-tactile receptive fields (RFs)
elements.2211.03049_2c5f829f948d99c8e87e92f025c2e: The first notion, space surrounding the body, can be pictured as a
elements.2211.03049_f87d74aeb4204b7bce4bf0a3b0f61: around individual body parts and following those body parts in space
elements.2211.03049_c6c9bceb7936659e93f260619e9eb: It is realized by bimodal neurons with tactile RFs on the skin and visual RFs around
elements.2211.03049_1f72f996500dedda24f1bbcf0d22c: The visual responses appear to be tuned to dynamically approaching objects and their activation is thus anticipatory, predictive of touch in the corresponding skin area
elements.2211.03049_56b84bc72a08dc5b91c9bfe01d9d3: There are also behavioral responses associated with the stimulation of some neurons of this network (squinting, ducking, and withdrawing from the direction of the potential threat)
elements.2211.03049_c595947bb4041135ba9ef5d2d9715: Therefore, this circuit is thought to be responsible for self-defense and maintaining a safety margin around the body
elements.2211.03049_693723250193d38b4a9a65c50ddf2: Little is known about the development of peripersonal space representations, with some evidence suggesting that even newborns can make sense of multisensory (audio-visual in this case) cue combinations specifying motion with respect to themselves
elements.2211.03049_0a5ccf5e0892d7c21fe9f80400049: Taking advantage of humanoid robots with whole-body sensitive skin, we designed a method where the robot learns such a safety margin from experience
elements.2211.03049_7e49064ce9a711143ffb76632b764: The robot records trajectories of approaching objects and if they eventually contact its body as perceived by the artificial skin, it learns the likelihood of such future contact
elements.2211.03049_4b053e2d978eaf5dd9209cfae63a4: The objects' positions perceived by the robot by stereo vision are remapped into the reference frames of every tactile sensor (taxel)
elements.2211.03049_3ec2ca0003c636a00f459231d1382: Every taxel then continuously updates a representation of the probability of objects at a certain distance
elements.2211.03049_173fc50ab6297879f2c652a3849f5: or with a certain time to contact
elements.2211.03049_c0cfe7ad7709c9e4ebee166e679ae: taxels can be aggregated and a most likely future collision site on the robot body computed
elements.2211.03049_7bceb7ca6d8c16cd19bed1e8772c0: This location on the robot body can then be connected to a controller that avoids the collision by moving the exposed body part away (video:
elements.2211.03049_9eae1d0f97a8b045bd65f5cc5b6dd: Alternatively, using the opposite sign for the movement direction,
elements.2211.03049_e329191298cf9ea556a5e4c0bf9ca: We developed an alternative learning algorithm in
elements.2211.03049_c90cfe7b19cf7a5aeafd006a3dbb6: , a neural network composed of a Restricted Boltzmann Machine and a feedforward neural network
elements.2211.03049_89a3a134bb1f985723a3726e83d58: The former learns in an unsupervised manner to represent position and velocity features of the stimulus
elements.2211.03049_b811ca75a7d3108143eec692a384b: The latter is trained in a supervised way to predict the position of touch (contact)
elements.2211.03049_efa338ab3b738cae02d2f4d21273f: , this model was trained in a simulated environment but it importantly take into account also the the uncertainty of all variables
elements.2211.03049_ceaf2a6ae95d9561b0c965af91ce2: Apart from modeling the operation, development, and adaption of peripersonal space representations in the brain,
elements.2211.03049_fa11720dadc60a9214bd6bd54fc27: representations are key for safe human-robot interaction
elements.2211.03049_1a1eab38c036b134b4fe54f781263: Appropriate collision avoidance strategies cannot be selected without a representation of the space surrounding the robot
elements.2211.03049_f872711e69593a9ce65c94c17947a: This space can be represented in various forms with regards to the needs of the application or robot platform
elements.2211.03049_8c52853491a640327341781f690fd: Multiple questions come forth in this context, namely the way the space is structured, how it will dynamically adapt and what is its geometry
elements.2211.03049_4a274d77d35b7e98fd1caf57419ff: A key component is the form of the representation of the robot and human body parts, or, in general, the representation of obstacles
elements.2211.03049_3ede26a3aaf62fffcd29cffc854a1: Drawing on the results of the computer graphics community (see
elements.2211.03049_3ef3bb5e59271937d18bcd7704fb6: for a survey), this often takes the form of some collision primitives
elements.2211.03049_3bc4230e9e3dce3bc780f454c8e8d: These can be simple shapes like spheres
elements.2211.03049_0039f3ceda46241610538973aa9fd: and can differ for the robot and the human.
elements.2211.03049_368fcff68a4bb841bf71ae8a6ed98: represent robot links as segments and humans as a set of capsules
elements.2211.03049_d9ede5460337523926ad9dceaeb5e: These shapes can also have a temporal aspect and represent so-called swept volumes, i.e. zones where the human or robot moved
elements.2211.03049_f84b74b522298a23ef242c6437821: For safety to be guaranteed, the whole body of both agents should be represented and considering only the robot end-effector or human hands or head does not suffice
elements.2211.03049_142c13d34bb701409dd10b7f36abd: Some representations change the volume dynamically based on the robot or human velocity
elements.2211.03049_898f505a320a0d25e2456e2c48a6f: The technologies applied to perception can influence the structure of the perirobot space too: Euclidean space can be replaced by a depth space approach to account for the occlusions and specific geometries of the field of view of a RGB-D sensor
elements.2211.03049_262ba882cd7d78eb01e52e4458a34: The best representation is yet to be found
elements.2211.03049_4ebac6baab56db8a007dd890a818d: These considerations tie directly into the topic of safe physical human-robot interaction discussed in Chapter
elements.2211.03049_e3810c40c365d39e85bd7721d0759: , newborns have not only limited conceptual and spatial knowledge about their bodies, but also limited
elements.2211.03049_1eb6417d7b81fa82769aa62322485: means to use their bodies for purposeful action or to localize and act on stimuli on their body
elements.2211.03049_5e265eec63c15478fa9164f45e040: They learn the necessary body models in the first years after birth, while continuously incorporating physical body growth as well as maturation of the sensory apparatus (vision in particular)
elements.2211.03049_9c578113991be02ec1bf748c78cbf: Next to the developmental time scale, human body representations were found to be adaptive (called
elements.2211.03049_140fde8883908aba963fd49c5b249: in neuroscience) on much shorter time scales, as demonstrated by the ability to use tools and their incorporation into the body schema
elements.2211.03049_f1f252049b094a0001e85e31af93a: learning and quickly adapting body models
elements.2211.03049_34b0ff972d7e45b52a95abfc5e05d: would be highly desired in robots
elements.2211.03049_0ab38de4c01cafa8da2d24f5efcae: Nowadays, humanoid but also other robots come with a rich set of powerful yet inexpensive sensors like cameras, RGB-D cameras, inertial, tactile or force sensors
elements.2211.03049_86aff1a0aeb63b85a79eca3ffde69: This opens up the possibility for calibration approaches that are more self-contained, can be performed autonomously and repeatedly by the robot, and that simultaneously estimate the position of the sensors with respect to the robot
elements.2211.03049_6fffcaf90d16d6241833c52f0307f: The kinematic chain can be closed exploiting physical contact (aka
elements.2211.03049_6306ace584c45b250e69df1af07e6: approaches) or by observing the robot pose using visual sensors (
elements.2211.03049_5832ab516e650dabe8d8d85ca203a: Next to traditional methods exploiting contact with the environment (e.g. robot touching a planar surface
elements.2211.03049_a2d9f78dea0053b1e59f0c1b0f217: B) or external metrology systems (e.g. laser trackers
elements.2211.03049_25135518828202d46bd5116a97387: C) as methods that are suited for automatic self-contained calibration.
elements.2211.03049_5500a2654ac38dd526708d940afff: An overview of the state of the art and future research directions regarding biologically inspired robot body models and self-calibration is provided in
elements.2211.03049_f2bcf4abe85c8eac29aa65e89f22a: In addition, four case studies are also included in this thesis
elements.2211.03049_2c780a9d2584ec8822b1d397ef278: , we systematically studied on the simulated iCub humanoid robot how self-observation, self-contact, and their combination can be used for self-calibration
elements.2211.03049_f5ac55d8234e8506c91b959c1194e: We found that employing multiple kinematic chains (self-observation and self-touch) is superior in terms of optimization results as well as observability
elements.2211.03049_33f83754f137abeea2cf6f4cba0ce: , we provided a unified formulation that makes it possible to combine traditional approaches with self-contained calibration available to humanoid robots in a single framework and single cost function
elements.2211.03049_abdb3830a3fab6428c6592dfd0d8f: Second, we presented an open source toolbox for Matlab (
elements.2211.03049_4124aa63b68f3513fc3d021d354cc: ) that provides this functionality, along with additional tools for preprocessing (e.g., dataset visualization) and evaluation (e.g., observability/identifiability)
elements.2211.03049_b64d62bad7887759c6c00c042cfe3: , we used self-contact as one of the methods to calibrate the positions of 970 pressure sensors on the body of a humanoid robot (the opposite approach to
elements.2211.03049_c2049f07b744bfde6e3e5579d6b09: where the skin was used to improve kinematic calibration)
elements.2211.03049_babf1434e8574157bd30664f39139: We experimentally compared the accuracy and effort associated with the following skin spatial calibration approaches and their combinations: (i) combining CAD models and skin layout in 2D, (ii) 3D reconstruction from images, (iii) using robot kinematics to calibrate skin by self-contact
elements.2211.03049_c698edfeea722419226d75d228e8c: , all four calibration methods schematically illustrated in Fig.
elements.2211.03049_d5e30dc2737cc8a138867ee002309: self-contact, contact with a plane, self-observation, and external device
elements.2211.03049_89b74f379446defd93e5a17714571: were experimentally compared on a dual-arm industrial manipulator
elements.2211.03049_af8aee2e8428282837d2c7cb44895: The main findings were: (1) when applying the complementary calibration approaches in isolation, the self-contact approach yields the best and most stable results; (2) all combinations of more than one approach were always superior to using any single approach in terms of calibration errors and the observability of the estimated parameters
elements.2211.03049_f879dde1097d603e0758a37280709: Combining more approaches delivers robot parameters that better generalize to the workspace parts not used for the calibration.
elements.2211.03049_5f30c6e9ab11c0ff509292957aa34: Robots are leaving safety fences and start to share workspaces or even living spaces with humans
elements.2211.03049_1411f41084b602b77009b85a2aed2: As they leave controlled environments and enter domains that are far less structured, they need to dynamically adapt to unpredictable interactions and guarantee safety at every moment
elements.2211.03049_7f918c4ed590e42f49fc4fa86e677: There has been rapid development in this regard in the last decade, with revisions of existing and introduction of new safety standards (
elements.2211.03049_e32472633f23d29c7ff5631669e42: for a survey)) and a rapidly growing market of collaborative robots
elements.2211.03049_527e5420d7afea1eded31225f650a: , there are two ways of satisfying the safety requirements when a human physically collaborates with a robot: (i)
elements.2211.03049_b9c4a2eca86c300ab995ab144f493: For PFL, physical contacts with a moving robot are allowed but the forces / pressures / energy absorbed during a collision need to be within human body part specific limits
elements.2211.03049_abbd7abb66ba1a45c18da52751924: This translates onto lightweight structure, soft padding and no pinch points on the robot side, in combination with collision detection and response relying on motor load measurements, force/torque or joint torque sensing
elements.2211.03049_6f5b1a80136204705ce98b9c646b5: This is addressed by interaction control methods for this post-impact phase (e.g.,
elements.2211.03049_68d7315520a0bc0487d9e5a1a212d: The performance of robots complying with this safety requirement in terms of payload, speed, and repeatability is limited
elements.2211.03049_bea78babfb6407f181fe9812a500c: Safe collaborative operation according to speed and separation monitoring prohibits contacts with a moving robot and thus focuses on the pre-impact phase: a protective separation distance,
elements.2211.03049_918b6749da799c25a31ba12e31914: , between the operator and robot needs to be maintained at all times
elements.2211.03049_5461f043ef7380b1fb16d66b9142c: , the robot is commanded to halt
elements.2211.03049_888c835a9a59d7ce19d90cc3516ce: is typically safeguarded using light curtains (essentially electronic versions of physical fences) or safety-rated scanners that monitor 2D or 3D zones
elements.2211.03049_d10174ec31b5ddcb650a38e232b8f: However, the flexibility of such setups is limited
elements.2211.03049_c1cd61f6dadc4bdf5c0455ec0e8ba: the information is reduced to detecting whether an object of a certain minimum volume has entered a predefined zone
elements.2211.03049_89597a264e3aa84b1a04d58c64e73: The higher the robot kinetic energy, the bigger is its footprint on the factory floor
elements.2211.03049_1b920e1d176ab2ce4e8e4bee0ddf4: This topic ties with the rest of the thesis as follows
elements.2211.03049_84e8bf0630a7623966cb9290323a9: First, not only robot performance but also safety is dependent on its accuracy and calibration
elements.2211.03049_6a68c3d646f039b271e5eafecb0d4: Thus, machines learning and adapting their body models (Chapter
elements.2211.03049_be8c0c7794dfb32cabd253c8f9004: ) are also likely to be safer for their environments
elements.2211.03049_847cbdd78ee5ac191b3c4432dfa87: Second, the use of artificial sensitive skins researched in my group can contribute an additional protective layer for collision detection and isolation during physical HRI (the PFL regime in particular)
elements.2211.03049_39229966ce71c9d667fc02b43e058: Third, adaptive multimodal representations of the robot peripersonal space (Chapter
elements.2211.03049_9524450bbcdb01169d27533136e20: ) could give rise to robots with a human-like margin of safety around their bodies and to new solutions to robot safety in the SSM regime
elements.2211.03049_47a9159b03ef10d65a4a3635cb0ab: , we deployed the two collaborative regimes (PFL and SSM) in a single application and studied the performance in a mock collaborative task under the individual regimes, including transitions between them
elements.2211.03049_d589ac5a673a10c651ec3122a061b: Additionally, we compared the performance under
elements.2211.03049_47073e80966536127605ba4aed6cb: with keypoint pair-wise separation distance assessment relying on an RGB-D sensor and skeleton extraction algorithm to track human body parts in the workspace
elements.2211.03049_08759bb051e155a5dd822c63057c6: Best performance has been achieved in the following setting: robot operates at full speed until a distance threshold between any robot and human body part is crossed; then, reduced robot speed per power and force limiting is triggered
elements.2211.03049_7f71000fb4c518fbd3e26481ea4d5: Robot is halted only when the operator's head crosses a predefined distance from selected robot parts
elements.2211.03049_0802bfc86537c6c47020da1472aaa: , we measured the forces exerted by two collaborative manipulators moving downward against an impact measuring device
elements.2211.03049_847c2009d37b28383a5311f00ebf6: First, we empirically showed that the impact forces can vary by more than 100 percent within the robot workspace
elements.2211.03049_653fb0c33439204414bd17c857cd0: The forces are negatively correlated with the distance from the robot base and the height in the workspace
elements.2211.03049_425101806dddb4c1a2330410f5b98: Second, we presented a data-driven model, 3D Collision-Force-Map, predicting impact forces from distance, height, and velocity and demonstrate that it can be trained on a limited number of data points
elements.2211.03049_f561ea49663be07b3658b67fd24b3: Third, we analyzed the force evolution upon impact and found that clamping never occurs for one of the robots (UR10e)
